channel.title: CVE Feed for recorp -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for recorp -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-45063|2023-10-12T12:41:25.690Z -- recorp -- ai%20content%20writing%20assistant%20%28content%20writer%2C%20gpt%203%20%26%204%2C%20chatgpt%2C%20image%20generator%29%20all%20in%20one
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in ReCorp AI Content Writing Assistant (Content Writer, GPT 3 & 4, ChatGPT, Image Generator) All in One plugin <= 1.1.5 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-31077|2023-11-10T13:36:15.359Z -- recorp -- export%20wp%20page%20to%20static%20html%2Fcss
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in ReCorp Export WP Page to Static HTML/CSS plugin <= 2.1.9 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-6369|2024-01-11T08:32:33.836Z -- recorp -- export%20wp%20page%20to%20static%20html%2Fcss
item.description: The Export WP Page to Static HTML/CSS plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access of data and modification of data due to a missing capability check on multiple AJAX actions in all versions up to, and including, 2.1.9. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to disclose sensitive information or perform unauthorized actions, such as saving advanced plugin settings.

item.title: CVE-2024-3206|2024-06-04T17:31:33.396Z -- recorp -- different%20menu%20in%20different%20pages%20%E2%80%93%20control%20menu%20visibility%20%28all%20in%20one%29
item.description: The Different Menu in Different Pages – Control Menu Visibility (All in One) plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access due to a missing capability check on the ajax() function in all versions up to, and including, 2.3.2. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to duplicate menus.
